page.title: 07POLICEWORK IN CUMNOCK (2)
page.content: There is quite a lot of paper work to be done. Sometimes it varies from 1 hour to 4 hours depending how important the enquiry is.Policemen can meet all kinds of people from a road sweeper to a managing director. They have to visit houses, factories, schools and offices in the course of their work. The policeman who was interviewed said he had become a policeman because of security, pay and career prospects. He also said the most unpleasant thing he had to do was dealing with children who have been killed. But he recommended the police force as a career because of the job security and the satisfaction of working with the public. Candidates for the police force must possess 4 O'grade passes in the SCE and if male must be 5'9" tall or 5'4" if female.
